item.title: Lace & Embroidered Fabric. Part 1. History & Types
item.description: Prologue I bought the pansies-strewn fabric impulsively without a clear idea, just because I liked it, & hadn’t worked with lace before. For the last reason, the fabric safely lay in the box for another year. Once a couple of months I took it out, chaotically draped on myself & without the desired result put it back. I knew it would be a dress, but what dress – that was the question.
